title_text: "Steele's ""Soldier's Service and Pay Book"" Malaya Command Military Driving Licence
subject_terms_1: This is a military driving licence. It is printed in black ink, on a sheet of paper with a green border. The title is printed at the top, and underlined. The fields are filled in with handwritten inscription in blue ink. There is a signature in the middle of the licence. There is a stamp in blue ink at the top right of the licence. documents (object genre) military vehicles
context_8: Great Britain. Army. Royal Field Artillery
subject_terms_2: world wars Vehicles, military Drivers' licenses
